name: uncharming
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person or their behaviour or comments) not polite or pleasant: Arguably, it's during the uncharming stages of adolescence when kids need the most parental support. She has become the butt of uncharming remarks about her fashion sense.
(of a place) not pleasant or attractive: The horses end up in a most uncharming setting: standing in filthy water and their own waste. Compare
charming
More examplesFewer examplesHe was the most uncharming human being she had ever met.He's probably going to walk in and say something uncharming and inarticulate.He was not entirely uncharming.
